oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sheriff Tom Cartwright headquarters for re-election at Noel Hotel, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from the Tom Cartwright re-election campaign headquarters at the Noel Hotel in Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1950s. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cartwright family
